channel.title: Clicking button sends npc chat? [pi]

item.title: Clicking button sends npc chat? [pi]
item.dc:creator: @sex-scape_owner sex-scape owner
item.description:
@sex-scape_owner wrote:

trying to add it so if you click a button on the donator menu it send the chat screen for a slayer task. (duradel)

atm this is what is suppost to happen when you click the button


			case 107229:
				if (c.isDonator == 1 && c.inGWD()) {
				c.Arma = 15;
				c.Band = 15;
				c.Sara = 15;
					c.sendMessage("Your magical donator rank forces your KC to raise to 15!");
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("You must be a donator and be in godwars dungeon to use this!");
				} 
			break;

ik its to do gwd but i as i dont have gwd in the server it has no use.

anyone can help would be appreciated thanks

Read full topic
